Posts.Content: ann1990 wrote: I am a 40 year old with fibrocystic breasts. My mother is a 2 time breast cancer survivor. (she was diagnosed post-menopause) Last night I discovered a bead like lump in my breast. I have a cluster of simple cysts in my left breast but have never felt anything hard like this. It is a few days before my period is due to start so my dr. wants to wait until that is over th examine me. Of course I am freaking out :) I keep reading on the internet and have read different opinions. Does hard and bead like mean malignant? I do have very fibrocystic breasts so I am hoping that is the.cause. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: bead like lump in breast ann1990 countrygrl
